data.text: @saint__july Thank you! From my understanding it’s both (from an approved place). Looks like they are changing the rules on March 26 x

@selfcaresnob You don’t need to be vaccinated to get into the state at the airport but you DO need the negative Covid test from a specific vendor. I think if you’re vaccinated the window you need it by is bigger but you still definitely need proof of a negative test. We are going too soon!
@selfcaresnob I went to Hawaii in October. All we needed was our vaccine card. They look at it when you get off the plane. If you aren’t vaccinated, you’ll need proof of a negative test.
Again, it looks like they’ll accept a vaccine card but then it seems like you also need a negative test…why don’t they say AND or OR?! https://t.co/1bYYvxSyHS
@selfcaresnob It looks like you need a test OR vaccination card!
